{{Description|An attack that combines Bennett's dreams and passion with Pyro. But passion is sometimes overblown, and Pyro sometimes blows over.}}
'''Passion Overload''' is [[Bennett]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|particles|2.25|3}}
** Holding but failing to trigger the first Charge Level is still considered press.
* {{TalentNote|icd|All DMG dealt by this skill|0|plural=1}}
* There are three stages to this attack; basic tap, level 1 charge, and level 2 charge.
** The basic tap has a 2B [[Gauge Unit Theory|Gauge]] application, making it effective against enemies like [[Abyss Lectors]], especially when paired with 4 piece [[Thundering Fury]] and Bennett's other abilities.
** The level 2 charge can also stagger and launch enemies like [[Lawachurls]] and [[Mitachurls]] into the air (see [[Interruption Resistance]]).
** The Level 2 charge also launches Bennett into the air unless he has a shield or [[Fearnaught]] unlocked while used inside [[Fantastic Voyage]].
** If under an effect that increases [[Interruption Resistance]] (such as any [[Shield]], [[Xingqiu]]'s [[Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen|Rain Swords]], or [[Beidou]]'s [[Stormbreaker|Elemental Burst]]), Bennett will not be launched after using the Charge Level 2 version of this skill.
*** One effect that is an exception to this is the [[Geo]]-aligned [[Traveler]]'s [[Invincible Stonewall|1st Constellation]].
* {{TalentNote|character=Bennett|talent=Passion Overload|ascension|1|Rekindle}}
* {{TalentNote|character=Bennett|talent=Passion Overload|ascension|2|Fearnaught}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|Unstoppable Fervor}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|4|Unexpected Odyssey}}
